spas.usercontrol

Class UserCourseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.usercontrol.UserCourseHandler

  • public class UserCourseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the course-saving and editing aspect of user database.
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti

    • Method Detail

      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String id)
        Adds a course to user's active courses.
        Parameters:
        name - Course's name.
        id - Course's id.
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, adding was successful.

      • getState

        public int getState(java.lang.String id)
        Get the status of a course. If there was no error it will return one of these: ACTIVE, NONACTIVE or COMPLETED.
        Parameters:
        id - The course's id.
        Returns:
        The course's status, or 0, if somethin went wrong.

      • changeState

        public boolean changeState(java.lang.String id,
                  int state)
        Change the status of a course. Use ACTIVE, NONACTIVE or COMPLETED to change the status.
        Parameters:
        id - The course's id.
        state - The new status for course.
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, nothing went wrong.

      • getGroup

        public java.lang.String getGroup(java.lang.String id)
        Get the group saved for user on a course.
        Parameters:
        id - The course's id.
        Returns:
        Course's group, or an empty String (not null), if it doesn't exist.

      • changeGroup

        public boolean changeGroup(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String group)
        Changes user's saved group for a given course.
        Parameters:
        id - The course's id.
        group - The new group.
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, nothing went wrong.

      • removeCourse

        public boolean removeCourse(java.lang.String id)
        Removes a course from user's file.
        Parameters:
        id - The course's id.
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, nothing went wrong.

      • getCourses

        public java.util.List<NCourse> getCourses()
        Get the courses user has saved.
        Returns:
        A list of chosen courses, or an empty list, if something went wrong.

      • containsCourse

        public boolean containsCourse(java.lang.String id)
        Checks to see, if given course if saved to file.
        Parameters:
        id - Course's id.
        Returns:
        true, if it is saved.
